headline: CME Group to Launch 100-Ounce Silver Futures to Meet Record Retail Demand
summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today announced it will launch a 100-Ounce Silver futures contract on February 9, 2026, pending regulatory review.

raw.headline: CME Group to Launch 100-Ounce Silver Futures to Meet Record Retail Demand
raw.summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today announced it will launch a 100-Ounce Silver futures contract on February 9, 2026, pending regulatory review.

headline: CME to Shift Precious-Metals Margin Settings as Prices Swing
summary: The shift takes effect from Tuesday’s close and follows a “normal review of market volatility to ensure adequate collateral coverage,” the CME said.  Precious metals have been the subject of an extraordinary rally over recent quarters, with the gains and price swings continuing into the new year.  In the latest leg higher, gold and silver both surged to records in Monday’s session, with the latter having already advanced by about a fifth in 2026.

headline: CME Group (CME): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q3 Earnings?
summary: Since July 2025, CME Group has been in a holding pattern, posting a small loss of 4.4% while floating around $264.82. The stock also fell short of the S&P 500’s 11.1% gain during that period.
